body: The tcipost wants fellow islanders to "remember that the people of Egypt this month used the internet to strengthen their voices and share information", suggesting that they can use the same tools to have their voices heard when it comes to the new constitution "that will dilute our vote as Turks and Caicos citizens."

title: Turks & Caicos: Using Social Media for Democracy
